alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 5:58AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Utah Valley and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on most area routes, particularly after sunset.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley
